body.name: Wireless Security Camera, 720P HD Mini WiFi Camera Video Recorder, with Back Clip, HD Night Vision, Portable APP Support Camcorder, for Home Surveillance Outdoor Office
features: High Definition Image: Equipped with a 720P HD image sensor and a large aperture, this small wireless WiFi camera improves clarity and enriches the image quality, capturing more details. The wide angle lens allows you to record a wider range of scenes.
HD Night Vision: This camera features five infrared light beads that can be activated when there is insufficient light, allowing you to see clear video images even at night.
WiFi Connectivity: The camera supports connecting to your phone via WiFi, and it has its own AP hotspot. Once connected, you can remotely view and transmit surveillance footage within the WiFi range.

Easy to Use: The camera can be easily attached to your chest with the included back clip, and the accompanying bracket makes it convenient for wall or horizontal installation. Simply insert a small memory card, push the power button to turn it on, and press the mode button to start recording.
Simultaneous Charging and Recording: This camera supports recording while charging, and it automatically overwrites old footage when the memory is full, allowing for 24 hour continuous recording.
body.description: Specification:Item Type: Small Wireless WiFi CameraMaterial: ABSWeight: Approx. 55g/1.9ozLens Type: HD Camera LensVideo Resolution: 720P (Maximum)Night Vision: SupportVideo Format: AVICharging Interface: Micro USBBattery Type: Lithium Ion BatteryBattery Capacity: 300mAh (Included)Storage Support: Up to 128G Small Memory Card (Card Not Included)Loop Recording: SupportPlayback Software: Built in System or Mainstream Media PlayerWiFi Connection: SupportAPP Name: for XIAODOUHow to Use:Install the small memory card, push the on button from off to on, short press mode to start recording video.Connect the phone: Scan the QR code on the manual on your phone, download for XIAODOU APP and open it, click the + sign in the upper right corner to add the device, and follow the operating instructionspacking list:1 x Small Wireless WiFi Camera1 x Charging Cable1 x User Manual1 x Back Clip1 x Base
